${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmount.NAME: Example 2

${ModID}:VenomPower.NAME: Venom
DESCRIPTIONS: When hit, creatures with #yVenom lose HP equal to unblocked damage, up to their amount of #yVenom, and lose that much #yVenom.

${ModID}:VenomRitualPower.NAME: Venom Ritual
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to the enemy having the most #yVenom equal to its #Venom amount.
